name.ja: ハイブリッドライブ・バリアテイル

summoning_condition.en: If you have "Hybridrive Screwdriver" face-up on your field, you can Normal Summon this card without Tributing.

effect.en: If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference). If you have a face-up Dragon Type monster on your field, face-up Dragon Type and Machine Type monsters on your field cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects.
